site.name: Nullianism
site.description: Addinin kimiyya na farko a duniya mai budadden tushe

hero.title: Nullianism
hero.subtitle: Addinin kimiyya na farko a duniya mai budadden tushe.

footer.aboutDescription: Addinin kimiyya na farko a duniya mai budadden tushe wanda ya dogara da son sani da tunani mai zurfi.
footer.builtWith: An gina tare da soyayya ga ilimi

community.title: Al'ummar Nullianism
community.howToBecomeText: Idan kuna raba ra'ayoyin da aka gabatar a nan, ku yi la'akari da kanku a matsayin Nullian. Babu bukatar tsari na hukuma. Addininmu yana da tsari mai zaman kansa.
community.howToHelpTitle: Yadda za a taimaka wa aikin?
community.bulletSuggestRest: don dokoki da al'adu ta hanyar {ISSUES} da {PULLS} a cikin ma'ajinmu.

resources.title: Albarkatu
resources.subtitle: Ga kayan aiki masu amfani da hanyoyin haɗi.
resources.recommendedLiteratureTitle: Litattafan da aka ba da shawarar
resources.recommendedPlaceholder: Jerin littattafai da kayan aiki za a ƙara ta al'umma.

notFound.title: Ba a sami shafi ba
notFound.description: Yana kama da wannan shafin bai bayyana ba tukuna a cikin sararin iliminmu.
